content:
Nin shreshdhathayil maathaavaay-daivathvatthe ullkkonda
Satthama thannormmadinatthil-nyangalle naathhaa cherkkename.

Vanchathivil ninnozhivaakaan-nin praarththhana nyangallkkabhayam
Ninnil preethan thaathannum-ninniludicha thanoojannum.

Ninnil vasichoru roohaaykkum-sthothram, thrithvaathmakashuddhaa
Nyangall thannaathmaakkallmel-cheytheedaname kaarunyam.
(o mariyaame nyaan thottakkaaran thanne ... Enna pole)

Mashihaayaal sampatthaarjicha
Nirddhanayaam mariyaaminu bhaagyam
Thal smrthi dhanyamanalpam sthuthyam
Thal keertthikallettum jaathikallum
/taa mariyaam chonnaall-vamshangall sarvvam
/tbhaagyam me nalkum-aarennil vaanu!
Kshanamekukayaalinnotheedaam
Bhaagyamavallkkathu satthamakarmmam.
